item.title: Call For Google Adsense Maths Class Charity Fund
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: I hereby call for setting up a charity fund so that we can donate some money to get the poor olâ€™ Google Adsense some Mathematics/Algebra 101 classes because apparantly it thinks that 0.63 + 0.07 = 0.69.
